text: @ArshadWarsi @CMOMaharashtra Is that an excse putting forward when Maharashtra is in trouble we all stood up despite of being in any work place caste & religion. Still during this covid19 outbreak they should've handled this situation KEM hospital is out of facilities and sry to say our CM failed.
